clothes.name: dress
clothes.info: A dress (also known as a frock or a gown) is a garment traditionally worn by women or girls consisting of a skirt with an attached bodice.

clothes.name: jacket
clothes.info: A jacket is a garment for the upper body, usually extending below the hips.

clothes.name: shirt
clothes.info: A shirt is a cloth garment for the upper body (from the neck to the waist).

clothes.name: skirt
clothes.info: A skirt is the lower part of a dress or a separate outer garment that covers a person from the waist downwards.

clothes.name: trousers
clothes.info: Trousers, slacks, or pants (North American English) are an item of clothing that might have originated in Central Asia, worn from the waist to the ankles.

clothes.name: jeans
clothes.info: Jeans are a type of pants or trousers, typically made from denim or dungaree cloth.

clothes.name: shoes
clothes.info: A shoe is an item of footwear intended to protect and comfort the human foot. Shoes are also used as an item of decoration and fashion.

clothes.name: suit jacket
clothes.info: A dresis a garment traditionally worn by women or girls consisting of a skirt with an attached bodice

clothes.name: blouse
clothes.info: A blouse is a loose-fitting upper garment that was worn by workmen, peasants, artists, women, and children.

clothes.name: coat
clothes.info: A coat is a garment worn on the upper body by either gender for warmth or fashion.
